title: Fort Davis National Historic Site: Education
body: For Teachers Fort Davis National Historic Site is where the history books come alive! Using Off and On-Site education programs your students will gain considerable knowledge of the Indian Wars, Buffalo Soldiers, Western progression and more.  Information on summer Teacher-Ranger-Teacher (TRT) program: http://www.nps.gov/teachers/teacher-ranger-teacher.htm http://teacherrangerteacher.org/ Fort Davis TRT Application                 Plan a Field Trip Plan a visit to our site!! Here's how . . Read More        On-Site Programs Are your students visiting Fort Davis?  How about an Education program to guide them through the fort?  Learn and have fun durring your visit! Read More        Fort Davis Curriculum Use these curriculum materials, in the classroom, to learn the story of Fort Davis.  Great for Pre- and Post- visit instruction! Read More        Partnership Resources Buffalo Soldier Online Field Trip and Webisodes! Read More        Teacher to Ranger to Teacher Become a park ranger for the summer, and bring that knowledge back to the classroom. Read More
